author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Rainbow Department Store to pay 2017 dividend on April 19
text:
April 12(Reuters) - Rainbow Department Store Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 4.5 yuan (pre-tax) for every 10 shares and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 5 new shares for every 10 shares for 2017, to shareholders of record on April 18
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 19 and the dividend will be paid on April 19
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/BPVWNg
